:D

My sister and I watched the "Samurai X: Trust &
Betrayal" OVA sometime last year, and afterwards we
got to talking about it. I mentioned that a lot of the
story is based on historical fact, and I told her a
little of what I knew about the Shinsengumi. She
suggested I write and draw a small doujinshi on them,
so I started doing some more research on the group. 

With PMK and last year's Taiga drama, its a sort of
been-there-done-that idea to write another account of
the Shinsengumi, but I'm still chugging along at it.
:) I can gather my character designs together and post
them for critique; I would love to get everyone's
input.

--- Ai
